channel.title: [Pi] Waves [Pi]
channel.description: Hey guys, with my fight caves, all the waves clump together, after I kill one npc, another spawns, how can I make it so that the waves spawns are 10 seconds apart?

item.title: [Pi] Waves [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

Team_Rocket:

One way, would be to have an Event register once a specific N.P.C. I.D. is in It’s Death Stage, and delay the next Spawn for the allotted amount of time, then dis-register said Event afterwards until it reverts back to the I.D.

I’d do as Jack suggested and use an event. If you are not competent enough to do this, you could just rip the code from Deltascape, but that code is horrible, inefficient and i recommend you don’t use it.

Read full topic
